'''Closed Beta Test 2''' (CBT2) was the second of three beta versions of ''Genshin Impact'' during its development. The beta was scheduled to last for about three weeks from March 18, 2020, to April 7, 2020. However, it was extended for an additional week, ending on April 13, 2020.<ref>Image: [[:File:Genshin Impact CBT 2 End Date Official Discord.png|CBT 2 Duration Extension Announcement]]</ref><ref>HoYoverse News: [https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/news/detail/3050 Letter from producer Hugh Tsai]</ref>
